msbt.message: All the stuff here is stuff that you like, yeah?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ya say that, and now here's <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A huh huh huhwow. Ya think ya know somebody A huh huh huh
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made from mushrooms?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wow You're a pro at this whole deserted-island deal, huh?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your How do youkeep it from melting?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's NOT really ice?<10_4 /> It IS really ice? <10_4 />It's NOT really ice? <10_4 />It IS really ice? <10_4 />Your furniture doesn't make sense
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This place is so chill I could just chill here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />and be chill
<20_2 arg="10" />Your <20_2 arg="9" /> was made out of wood blocks, right?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Neeeeeeeeeeeeat

Antiques are things that were made a long time ago, right?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So your is an antique, yeah? Innnteresting<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Heyif I hide one of my toys in the attic, would it turn into an antique?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your really reminds me of school.I'll tell ya, my favorite part of school was LUNCHTIME!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I ALWAYS won the pudding-eating race.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh yeah, I really dig stuff like this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It can make anybody's house feel like a vacation destination!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, . You've got in your house?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is this house also your secret base for some kinda secret job?Work's important, I suppose, but you gotta leave time to chill too.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is so Wow. That's a lot of wood. Right? It's not just me? Lotta wood.But I gotta tell ya, it really suits your place.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You walk in and your first thought is, "Here's somebody who likes their furniture made with a LOT of wood."

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That is one of the "cute-theme" things I've seen at the shop!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I always see them and say, "Those are cute." So I guess they're doing something right, huh?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your 's made from fruit YOU picked? That's wild Yummm, smells good.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You dig retro stuff like , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If you just stand and stare at a piece of retro furniture, it starts to feel like you've traveled back in time.Cheap time travel's the best!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Neat! That's justwow! It's real exciting!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nobody really knows this, but toy-themed furniture issort of a passion of mine.Your piece here clearly mimics the design aesthetics of Sandra Klaez. You may not know that name, buther work absolutely defined—some argue CREATED—the early twentieth century toy-furniture movement.I'm probably boring you, aren't I?<10_4 /> A huh huh huh, never mind. I lost my train of thought anyway.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made from real shells?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sniff sniff sniff I thought I smelled the ocean!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is so neat!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Since it's made of iron and wood, maybe ya could use it like a shovel or an axe?
<20_2 arg="10" />I kinda wanna eat your <20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's bad manners to eat furniture that isn't yours though, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, where'd you get the cool , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Did someone in your family make it? Aww, I wish someone in my family would make me something like that.Hey! I could make something like that! I'm in my family!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, you actually keep in your room?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I collect outer-space stuff too. Then I pretend my room IS outer space, so I can eat astronaut ice cream!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What are you doing with in here, a huh huh huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is there gonna be a wedding? With dancing? And music? AND CAKE?!
